title: Correction: Using whole-genome sequence data to examine the epidemiology of Salmonella, Escherichia coli and associated antimicrobial resistance in raccoons (Procyon lotor), swine manure pits, and soil samples on swine farms in southern Ontario, Canada
content: by Nadine A. Vogt, Benjamin M. Hetman, David L. Pearl, Adam A. Vogt, Richard J. Reid-Smith, E. Jane Parmley, Nicol Janecko, Amrita Bharat, Michael R. Mulvey, Nicole Ricker, Kristin J. Bondo, Samantha E. Allen, Claire M. Jardine
author: Nadine A. Vogt
